title: Ask Hola extension maker which makes this extension for google chrome, firefox, etc., also make the extension available for microsoft edge
body: Hola extension is the best vpn service provider I have used so far. Please make this extension available for microsoft edge as well.

comments.body: One of the main reasons why I can't use Bing Search in Edge is because Edge does not  have Hola extensiom, but I like the Bing search engine.
